title: Kevin Hart has to SKIP an awards gala as he is still too injured from near-fatal car crash
text:
Kevin Hart is skipping a Los Angeles Mission awards ceremony on Thursday as he continues to recover from his shocking early September car crash.

The evening's host Nick Cannon will collect the prize for Kevin, 40, and his second wife Eniko Hart, 35, TMZ reported.

At Thursday's 9th Annual Legacy Of Vision gala, the Los Angeles Mission will celebrate the work Kevin and Eniko have done for them.

Rest and recuperation: Kevin and Eniko Hart are skipping a Los Angeles Mission awards ceremony on Thursday as he continues to recover from his shocking September car crash; seen in September 2018

Kevin still feels physically unprepared to tackle a whole awards show despite his desire to be there, according to TMZ sources.

The gala would have been the first public appearance since the crash by Kevin, who is now in out-patient treatment after in-patient rehab.

After suffering three spinal fractures in the car crash, Kevin underwent back surgery and spent 10 days in the hospital prior to his rehab transfer.

The incident occurred in Calabasas while Kevin was being driven in his 1970 Plymouth Barracuda by his friend Jared Black.

Stepping in: The evening's host Nick Cannon (pictured in late September) will collect the prize for Kevin, 40, and his second wife Eniko Hart, 35, TMZ reported

Jared was in the driver's seat, his fiancee Rebecca Broxterman in the back and Kevin in the front passenger seat when the car veered off the road and struck a tree.

Reckless driving was the culprit in the frightening incident, the California Highway Patrol reported as cited by CNN.

'I have nothing but love for Jared and wish him and Rebecca a speedy recovery,' Kevin told CNN through his attorney Andrew Brettler.

Holding off: Kevin still feels physically unprepared to tackle a whole awards show despite his desire to be there, according to TMZ sources; seen in January

Authorities deduced Jared was not under the influence the night of the crash, but he, Kevin and Rebecca supposedly neglected to wear their seatbelts.

Rebecca, who happens to be Eniko's personal trainer, did not need to be hospitalized after the accident, although her fiance did.

Kevin was glimpsed for the first time since then this Monday night when he dined with Jay-Z at Avra Beverly Hills Estiatorio.
description: Kevin Hart is skipping an awards ceremony Thursday night at the Los Angeles Mission as he continues to recover from his shocking September car crash.
